channel.title: HTTP on Xi Wang
channel.description: Recent content in HTTP on Xi Wang

item.title: Web Technology
item.description: HTTP HTTPis a protocol which allows the fetching of resources, such as HTML documents. It is the foundation of any data exchange on the Web and it is a client-server protocol, which means requests are initiated by the recipient, usually the Web browser. It is an application layer protocol that is sent over TCP, or over a TLS-encrypted TCP connection, though any reliable transport protocol could theoretically be used.
